column1: Description: Government spending per person, 2011 PPP$. Data is for 2016 or most recent year prior
Description: Government spending per person, 2011 PPP$. Data is for 2016 or most recent year prior.

Description: Total expenditure by the government divided by the total population. Figures are displayed in 2011 PPP$ (purchasing power parity). (Data series is from 1999-2023, where available. The hover function details whether the data point is an actual or a projected figure.)
On the 'Data-wide-value' sheet, we have provided the indicator in a wide format. The values you see listed there are from the 'value' column.
The following is data downloaded from Development Initiative's Datahub: http://devinit.org/data
